title: Ante Organik - maybe closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Buffet, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is mostly vegetarian and vegan with just a few non-veg dishes. Salad bar changes daily. Uses locally sourced organic ingredients. Run by a couple with a seasoned chef in the kitchen. NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
